Articles.Content: When I try to make a fairing I get a warning message saying "Fairing is colliding with invalid assembly part" I know that my rectracted antenna is causing it but its retracted yet it still says that error.

i had this one my one vessel too. it didn't have antennas, it happened with all fairing sizes so when my vessel vas 1,25m i couldnt even make 3,5m fairing because of this. I reloaded game and then i could finish building fairing no problem.
